page.title: 01SETTING THE SCENE
page.content: Our block lies on the western boundary of the City of Nottingham.It has been developed from the original farming communities of Bramcote, Stapleford, and Chilwell. In the north_east sector there is extensive private housing, and recreational development, favoured by professional people. Chilwell and Stapleford have a mixture of private and public housing, serving a range of light and heavy industries. Arable farming is disappearing under the continuing pressure for further housing development. The Erewash valley on the west of the block is a north/south routeway for the M1 motorway, the London Sheffield railway, and the Erewash canal. The A52 provides the main east/west road link through the area.
